item.description:
A very nice scenic hike along the Millers River from Athol to South Royalston. 8 mile moderate hike at an average pace.

Bring water, lunch, snacks, bugspray, rain jacket. Dress for the weather. Heavy rain cancels.

Meet at 9 am at the Millers River Environmental Center { MREC ) 100 Main Str. Athol. The parking lot is in the rear of the building. From there, we will spot cars. Option to socialize at the South Royalston Country store. They have full menu options.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Millers River/ Baquag River Trail Hike
